docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Secretary Caspar Weinberger's March 27 Op-Ed article, "Congress as the Crisis," calls for an answer. The Administration has repeatedly said that it was "unconstrained" Congressional spending that threatened to push fiscal 1973 outlays from the President's proposed budget figure of $246 billion to $261 billion. That $15.
